name: Little Ba11 Adventures
description:
Welcome to Little Ba11 Adventures! As the name of this game suggets, you are in control of a (not so little) ball, and your objective is to collect some coins... Just 90 of them, and you'll be a winner, yay!

It may sound really hard, but don't worry, fellow player, just believe in yourself... And never let up! (even if you want to).
